title: Sun and Power
imageAlt: a typical Chicago apartment building with the wooden staircase in the back is basked in the evening sun. In the foreground a power pole stands with electrical wires running off of it in all directions, crisscrossing across the entire scene except for the top left quadrant

title: Whose Streets?
imageAlt: a person stands in the middle of a crosswalk, back to the camera, feet firmly planted, patiently waiting for a safe opportunity to cross the street as an SUV speeds through the crosswalk a few feet in front of the person

title: Dangerous Plant
imageAlt: large round planter on a sidewalk in front of a brick building. It's wrapped in bright orange mesh and the sidewalk below appears wet from a recent watering,

title: Kornhausbrücke Portal
imageAlt: a pedestrian tunnel with an arched roof through a large bridge that spans a river on the right. There's a fence on the right between the sidewalk and the river.

title: Pick Me Up
imageAlt: a construction site lies in front of two elevated Chicago L tracks, one that passes over the other with gentle curve. A row of storefront sits in the right mid-ground and one of the storefront has a sign that reads 'Pick Me Up'.

title: Scary Bush
imageAlt: Two large bushes on the side of a road have large textile decals of eyes and mouths with pointy, serrated teeth

title: Big Number Five
imageAlt: a large styrofoam number 5 that is tilted at an angle resting against and behind a metal fence in front of an apartment building,

title: Noguchi Museum
imageAlt: overlooking a courtyard with a brick wall covered in dead vines on a foggy day. The background contains metal industrial buildings and chain-link fences, and some taller buildings further back that are partly obscured by fog

title: Zollhaus Rooftop
imageAlt: a chair and three small tables are situated on a rooftop in Zurich on an overcast day. The rooftop is bordered by box planters which are overgrown with grasses and other plants.

title: Glass Houses
imageAlt: a large multi-story building with a facade made of glass bricks sits nestled between a painted brick seafoam green building and an unpainted yellow brick building. Electrical wires crisscross in the foreground,

title: N. Richmond St. Alley
imageAlt: a snow-covered Chicago alley with slushy tire tracks. The alley is lined on one side by a wooden fence, and a garage on the other side

title: White Elephant
imageAlt: a white statue of an elephant with its trunk held high. It stands in front of a green hedge in the backyard of a row house with several other houses visible in the background.

title: Scratches
imageAlt: A view of the north branch of the Chicago river looking towards the Chicago skyline. An empty barge floats on the right side of the frame. This photo is in black and white.

title: Something
imageAlt: Industrial structures, dark conveyor belts, a central tower. The conveyor belt on the right extends down from the tower to the right side of the frame. Another cuts across the frame from just below the top of the tower and the other conveyor belt  to the left of the frame. A low building with a garage door sits below the tower. This photo is in black and white.

title: Underelevated
imageAlt: On the left side of the frame is an elevated Chicago transitway. On the right side is the back of a building with fire escapes on its walls. The center of the frame, in the distance is illuminated by sunlight. The foreground is in shadow. Dumpsters and a car are visible in the alley. This photo is in black and white.

title: Where’re We Going
imageAlt: A large gnarly tree with lots of burrs and knots stands to the right of a brick wall. The other side of the brick wall is a garage door. To the right of the tree sits a dumpster and a view down an alley. In the distance, the back half of an old sedan is visible. This photo is in black and white.

title: Untitled
imageAlt: Building with dark burned wooden cladding with a few large panels of light plywood attached to the side. Electrical wires run diagonally across the frame in front of the building. This photo is in black and white.

title: Unplugged Textures
imageAlt: The corner of an industrial building where it meets the ground. On the ground, in front of the building is an unplugged hose of some type. The left of the building is standing water, possibly flooded. The top half of the visible portion of the building is dark sheet metal, the bottom half is light concrete. This photo is in black and white.

title: Wild Mile
imageAlt: Floating walkway on the Chicago river know as the Wild Mile. The walkway weaves between floating plants. In the center of the frame is a life saver floatation device.

title: Double Half
imageAlt: An accidental double exposure. The first exposure covers only the top half of the frame and shows legs of two people standing against a wall outdoors. The second exposure covers the whole frame and shows a stack of plastic chairs against a brick wall in an alley next to a telephone pole. This photo is in black and white.
